comments.body: Previously, `changed` could only be true if the option was changed. Now, it can already be `True` if we have added an ending newline to the file. This is why I have modified this.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +212,216 @@                    if match_opt(option, line):
                        newline = assignment_format % (option, value)
                        option_changed = ini_lines[index] != newline
                        changed = changed or option_changed
                        if option_changed:
